EmailTemplate.name: 18-02 ARL Faster Ownership
EmailTemplate.subject: Introducing Adjustable Rate Loans for {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We've been listening to your feedback!
BlueWave will now be providing an Adjustable Rate Loan to our Loyal Blue Partners to improve your customer conversion rates. Lower than Market Rates for the first 5 years provide a faster path to ownership at a lower total cost for customers.
Additional Customer Benefits provided by BlueWave Financing:
Interest-Only Payments for 18 months: Upfront savings with interest-only payments following the installation period. No Money Down: Customers make no payments until after system installation No Penalties for Early Repayment: Ability to pay off loans early for additional savings. Online, Automated Bill-Pay: We make signing up and managing loans seamless & secure. Personal Support: Best in class service from BlueWave Customer Care.
Are you interested in providing Adjustable Rate Loans? Please contact your BlueWave Partner to learn about eligibility.
Thank you for working with BlueWave to provide Solar for Everyone, Everywhere! - All of us here at BlueWave
